Text.Page:
Hey, I don't suppose you're on your way to the Creation Workshop in Velika, are you? I'm waiting for a weapon from them—do you think you could stop in and ask Santia when it will be finished?

Only if you happen to find yourself going that way, of course.

Oh, Velika's left...well, nevermind. I completely forgot about Jefaln's weapon. I'm absolutely swamped, though—it would really help me out if you could get materials from Thura and a design from Babur, and then process this ore for me.

Don't worry, I'll make the actual weapon, and it won't take long, but it would go so much faster if the ore was already processed.

Hello! I handle reagents and parts, parts and reagents! They sound like the same thing. I guess they are, really, but everyone refers to them as separate things.

Anyway, you use them for different things. And in any case, I carry both. What did you want?

Designs, designs, I'm up to my eyeballs in designs. You look rather plaid. Ha! Ha ha!

Ha? Eh, design merchant humor. You wouldn't get it.

Anyhow, here's the design you'll need.
Nicely done. Take this weapon design for your help.

What are you staring at? Your arms broken?

Well, I didn't see materials in them, so I assumed you had trouble lifting them.
